name: places/ChIJwzwVV5ZYwokRNTTOY-i2pn4
formattedAddress: 121 E 83rd St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 121 E 83rd St, New York, NY 10028-0803, USA

originalText.text: Seeing Dr. Silich was one of the BEST decisions I have ever made. I recently had major surgery and I decided to have Dr. Silich close my incision. I am a surgeon myself - so not easy to be a patient - and Dr. Silich walked me through the process from the first moment he met me. His explanations were thorough and he let me know what to expect after surgery. His care, compassion and warm bedside manner were so appreciated. Furthermore, his 'work' is impeccable and  I could not be happier with the result. It is rare to find an office where the staff reflects the surgeon's attitude and his office staff is also awesome. Basically, I give Dr. Silich my highest recommendation - you would be lucky to have him as your surgeon!

originalText.text: Dr Silich is a talented professional with an understanding of the emotions attached  to surgery.  I have sent many family members and friends to Dr Silich. It is a pleasure when I hear how satisfied they are with their results . He is a gift to plastic / cosmetic surgery in New York ..

originalText.text: I recently fractured my nose and needed multiple sutures in my eyelid and lip.  Dr. Silich was amazing. He met me during his off hours to suture me up and then next day he reset my nose in the OR at his private office. He did a beautiful job and I didn’t feel any pain after my procedure. He followed up after the surgery and his staff was extremely professional!  I would highly recommend Dr. Robert Silich!!
